description: Try our easy to follow Green Glug Dip With Ghost Chips recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Green Glug Dip With Ghost Chips
name: Green Glug Dip With Ghost Chips Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Serve green glug dip with ghost chips and lemon wedges. Scatter with extra mint leaves to garnish.
